docs.title: Security Advisories Database
docs.text: Welcome to our Security Advisories portal. As a CISA CNA, we are committed to maintaining transparency and providing detailed information about security vulnerabilities.

docs.title: Quick Links
docs.text:
• Disclosure Policy
  • Submit Vulnerability
  • Contact

docs.title: CVE Disclosure: {{CVE-ID}}
docs.text:
table title, date, severity
from "CVE Disclosures"

docs.title: Description
docs.text: Detailed description of the vulnerability, including how it can be exploited and its potential impact.

docs.title: Affected Versions
docs.text: List of affected versions of the software or system.

docs.title: Severity
docs.text: Severity level and explanation of the severity.

docs.title: CVSS Score
docs.text: CVSS Score and vector.

docs.title: Discovered By
docs.text: Name of the discoverer or organization that found the vulnerability.

docs.title: Disclosure Timeline
docs.text:
• Discovery Date: {{}}
  • Disclosure Date:
  • Patch Available:
  • Patch Release Date:

docs.title: Mitigation
docs.text: Steps or recommendations for mitigating the vulnerability.

docs.title: References
docs.text:
• [Reference 1]
  • [Reference 2]

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: Any additional information or notes about the vulnerability.

docs.title: CVE Disclosure: {{CVE-ID}}
docs.text:
table title, date, severity, status
from "CVE Disclosures"
where status = "pending"
sort date asc

docs.text: Detailed description of the vulnerability, including how it can be exploited and its potential impact.
